string-array.name: textAboutOne
string-array.item: When logic is powerless..\n\n
The desire to distinguish between two types of knowledge (intuitive and logical) - emerged already in antiquity.\n\n
In today\'s world have proven that you can train your intuition and not very difficult!\n\n
How could still hear the voice of your intuition?\n\n
First of all, a firm belief in themselves and their forces - the basis for the successful training of intuition.

string-array.name: textAboutTwo
string-array.item: We have prepared three exercises to train your intuition,\n
with different levels of difficulty.\n\n
No matter in what order you will use exercises - make them everyday.\n\n
For each exercise accumulates skill (%) and displayed on the main screen of the application.\n
The skill index is calculated as an average over seven days of exercises (not a calendar).

string-array.name: textAboutThree
string-array.item: How it\'s work?\n
Before the open button on the screen - listen to the inner voice (it can be visual or auditory association).\n\n
Further, IT IS IMPORTANT - try to remember this feeling, or association, and then open the button.\n\n
Compare with the results (true or not).\n\n
The main goal during training - to hear and discern answers your intuition.\n\n
Make daily exercises for improving your intuition (about 10 minutes),
and your Sixth Sense will increase the efficiency of approximately 1..5% in each week.\n
Training of the Intuition - is perseverance, practice and belief in yourself!\n\n
Yes, you will arrive with Power of Intuition!
